item.title: FT Most Read: Wednesday, November 20, 2024 at 12:30 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Ukraine strikes Russia with US-made long-range missiles for first time
2. Marc Rowan emerges as a top contender to be Trump’s Treasury secretary
3. Chinese vessel spotted where Baltic Sea cables were severed
4. [Opinion] Trump’s demolition of the US state
5. SpaceX abandons attempt to catch Starship booster as Trump watches
item.guid: FT Most Read: Wednesday, November 20, 2024 at 12:30 PM UTC
